name: Hurricane Wind Power
overview: Hurricane Wind Power is an American wind power company whom is dedicated to building wind generators in the USA. The company is dedicated to facilitating the growth of sustainable energy solutions for the average do it yourselfer whom needs the proper guidance and support to effectivley install a renewable energy system. Hurricane Wind Power was founded in 2009 and has expanded from the field of wind power and has released products for micro hydro generation as well as solar. With a full compliment of support products HWP is able to facilitate installations using multiple renewable energy technologies. They have also brought inovative products to the market in the way of multi output generator that provide flexible power curves. Hurricane has recently expanded into the survival market providing mobile emergency power solutions. Since their inception they have consistantly brought to and inovative products to market and continue to grow and a rate of nearly 100 percent per year.
